description:
Single storey front/side extension; single storey rear extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of three roof lights to front roofslope (Lawful Development Certificate for a Proposed Development)
Single storey front/side extension; single storey rear extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of three roof lights to front roofslope (Lawful Development Certificate for a Proposed Development)

Proposal for Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof dormer extension with flat roof and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope and single storey entrance lobby, single storey rear extension with flat roof.
Work will be carried out using traditional building material and work to be carried out during normal working hours.
decision_conditions: The proposal falls within the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015. It is therefore lawful.
